Package org.openscience.cdk.smsd.algorithm.vflib.builder

Class VFQueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.openscience.cdk.smsd.algorithm.vflib.builder.VFQueryBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
IQuery
@Deprecated public class VFQueryBuilder extends Object implements IQuery
Deprecated.
SMSD has been deprecated from the CDK with a newer, more recent version of SMSD is available at http://github.com/asad/smsd.
Class for parsing and generating query graph.
Author:
Syed Asad Rahman <asad@ebi.ac.uk>
Source code:
main
Belongs to CDK module:
smsd
